backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, help requests, lesson categories, and lessons with sorting utilities and access control mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping hero image update tasks to the LearnHero.tsx file with linked components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for learn, lesson detail, guided forms, and contact pages wrapped in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Global layout with header navigation, logo, main content slot, and footer with links and social icons.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the static app logo image with alt text.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/form: Defines predefined form templates with fields for job applications, surveys, and registrations.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/Guid: Multi-step guided form wizard handling form selection, field entry, validation, review, and WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/type: Declares TypeScript types for form templates, fields, form data, and validation results.
frontend/src/components/guided-form/vali: Provides field and form validation logic for required fields, email, and phone formats.
Renders the hero section for the learning page with a title, description, and hero image.
frontend/src/components/learn/LessonList: Displays lessons filtered by category with loading states, tags, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/learn/ScamAwaren: Shows a checklist of red and green flags to identify potential scams.
frontend/src/components/support/HelpRequ: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state and AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching lesson categories, lessons, disclaimers, support info, and submitting help requests via an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ContactSupportPage.ts: Displays support contact info, safety reminders, and a help request form using data from React Query.
frontend/src/pages/GuidedFormFillingPage: Renders an overview and a guided form wizard for step-by-step form assistance.
frontend/src/pages/LearnPage.tsx: Loads and displays the learning disclaimer, scam checklist, and lesson categories with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LessonDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed lesson content with tags, reading time, disclaimer, and safety checklist, handling loading and missing lessons.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins including container queries and animate.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing feature requirements, and image handling instructions for a hero image replacement task.
